variable.label: Primary Address (1-127)
variable.tooltip: Sets the Primary (short, 2 digit) address

variable.label: Start Voltage (0-255)
variable.comment: A value of 255 corresponds to full voltage available
variable.tooltip: Sets the starting voltage at throttle speed step 1

variable.label: Acceleration Rate (0-255)
variable.tooltip: Sets the acceleration rate (delay). Higher number = slower rate

variable.label: Braking Rate (0-255)
variable.tooltip: Sets the deceleration rate (delay). Higher number = slower rate

variable.label: Manufacturer Version ID
variable.tooltip: This is the decoder software version identifier (read only)

variable.label: BEMF Cutout (0-127 or 128-255)
variable.tooltip:
Up to 127, this sets the speed step above which the intensity of BEMF control will be reduced
to zero. Values over 127 cause the BEMF to decrease as a percentage (up to 50%).

variable.label: Packet Time Out Value (0-255)
variable.tooltip:
Sets the time period that is allowed to elapse between receipts of a valid packet
addressed to the decoder before a throttle shutdown occurs. Enter zero to disable.

variable.label: Power Source Conversion Type
variable.tooltip:
Defines the type of power source the decoder should
switch to whenever a DCC signal is not present.
(Tip: Alternate Power Source must be enabled)

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F1
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F1 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F2
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F2 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F3
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F3 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F4
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F4 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F5
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F5 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F6
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F6 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F7
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F7 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F8
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F8 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F0(f)
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F0(f) when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F0(r)
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F0(r) when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F9
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F9 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F10
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F10 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F11
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F11 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F12
variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F12 when the unit is operating in analog power mode

variable.label: CV Unlock Register (0-7)
variable.tooltip:
Enter the Lock ID Code to unlock access to the decoder CVs.
(Tip: Establish the unlock code with CV Lock ID Code)

variable.label: CV Lock ID Code (0-7)
variable.tooltip: Sets the unlock code that must be entered into the CV Unlock Register in order to access the decoder CVs

variable.label: Extended Address (0001-9999)
variable.tooltip: Sets the Extended (long, 4 digit) address

variable.label: Consist Address (0-127)
variable.comment: Stores consist address. Range 0-127 (direction set in bit 7)

variable.label: Loco Direction In Consist
variable.comment: A consist address over 127 will also set this bit

variable.label: Consist Address Activation for F0(f) in Forward
variable.item: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward

variable.label: Consist Address Activation for F0(r) in Reverse
variable.item: Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse

variable.label: Consist Acceleration Rate (0-127)
variable.comment: Additional consist acceleration (combined with CV3)
variable.tooltip: When loco is in a consist, it's base acceleration rate is modified by this amount

enumChoice.choice: Add value to base acceleration rate (increases acceleration delay)
Subtract value from base acceleration rate (decreases acceleration delay)

variable.label: Consist Braking Rate (0-127)
variable.comment: Additional consist braking (combined with CV4)
variable.tooltip: When loco is in a consist, it's baseline braking rate is modified by this amount

variable.label: Consist Braking Sign
variable.tooltip: Determines whether value is added to or subtracted from loco baseline braking rate

enumChoice.choice: Add value to baseline braking rate (increases braking delay)
Subtract value from baseline braking rate (decreases braking delay)

variable.label: Speed Table Selection
variable.tooltip: Select a manufacturers speed curve, or use a curve you define yourself.

variable.label: CV Lock Enable
variable.tooltip: Enable locking of CVs when decoder is used in a multi-decoder installation

enumChoice.choice: Enable CV Lock as set in CVs 15 and 16

variable.label: CV Clear (CVCLR)
variable.tooltip: Tip: To do a one-time decoder reset, use the menu [Reset] selection

enumChoice.choice: Reset all CVs to default values at next power cycle

variable.label: Function Group 2 and 3 Exchange
variable.tooltip: Function Group 2 (F5-F8) assignments are swapped with Function Group 3 (F9-F12)

variable.label: Analog Whistle Control (0-255)
variable.tooltip: Value of 0 = Disabled. See command station instructions for the value to enable this feature.

variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Effect Selection
variable.tooltip: Determines the effect generated from the headlight

variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Phase Selection
variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects

variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Grade Crossing Logic
variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded

variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Rule 17 Mode
variable.tooltip:
Converts the headlight and backup light to independent, non-directional lights. Headlight
is controlled as if it were FX5, Function 5 and the backup light as FX6, Function 6.

variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Light Type
variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs

variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Effect Selection
variable.tooltip: Determines the effect generated from the backup light

variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Phase Selection
variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects

variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Grade Crossing Logic
variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded

variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Rule 17 Mode
variable.tooltip:
Converts the headlight and backup light to independent, non-directional lights. Headlight
is controlled as if it were FX5, Function 5 and the backup light as FX6, Function 6.

variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Light Type
variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs

variable.label: FX5 Effect Selection
variable.comment: Don't show this for the TSU-750 models
variable.tooltip: Determines the effect generated from the FX5 light output

variable.label: FX5 Phase Selection
variable.comment: Don't show this for the TSU-750 models
variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects

variable.label: FX5 Grade Crossing Logic
variable.comment: Don't show this for the TSU-750 models
variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded

variable.label: FX5 Light Type
variable.comment: Don't show this for the TSU-750 models
variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs

variable.label: FX6 Effect Selection
variable.comment: Don't show this for the TSU-750 models
variable.tooltip: Determines the effect generated from the FX6 light output

variable.label: FX6 Phase Selection
variable.comment: Don't show this for the TSU-750 models
variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects

variable.label: FX6 Grade Crossing Logic
variable.comment: Don't show this for the TSU-750 models
variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded

variable.label: FX6 Light Type
variable.comment: Don't show this for the TSU-750 models
variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs

variable.label: Hyperlight Flash Rate (0-15)
variable.comment: 0 is fast, 15 is slow, 4 is recommended for start
variable.tooltip: Sets the overall flash rate of the Hyperlight effects

variable.label: Grade Crossing Hold Time (0-15)
variable.comment: 0-15 seconds
variable.tooltip: Sets the time (in seconds) an effect will stay on after the horn button is released

variable.label: F11 Braking Rate (0-127)
variable.comment: Additional braking when Fll activated (combined with CV4)
variable.tooltip: When F11 is pressed, locos baseline braking rate is modified by this amount

variable.label: F11 Braking Sign
variable.tooltip: Determines whether value is added to or subtracted from loco baseline braking rate

enumChoice.choice: Add value to baseline braking rate (increases braking delay)
Subtract value from baseline braking rate (decreases braking delay)

variable.label: Transponding Control
variable.tooltip: Compensates for incompatibilities that may occur when using some methods of transponding

variable.label: Analog Mode Motor Start Voltage (0-255)
variable.tooltip: Sets the voltage difference between when the decoder first powers up and when the locomotive starts to move

variable.label: Analog Mode Max Motor Voltage (0-255)
variable.tooltip: Sets the maximum average voltage applied to the motor when operating in analog mode

variable.label: Forward Trim (0-255)
variable.tooltip:
Allows the decoders overall throttle response in the forward direction to be adjusted up or down.
Values 1-127 will decrease motor voltage, 129-255 will increase it. A value of zero will disable.
Tip: this feature only active when speed tables are enabled.

variable.label: Reverse Trim (0-255)
variable.tooltip:
Allows the decoders overall throttle response in the reverse direction to be adjusted up or down.
Values 1-127 will decrease motor voltage, 129-255 will increase it. A value of zero will disable.
Tip: this feature only active when speed tables are enabled.

variable.label: User Identifier #1 (0-255)
variable.tooltip:
Use to set a custom user ID or number. Note: when
the decoder is reset to default values, this CV is
preset to the softwares minor revision code.

variable.label: User Identifier #2 (0-255)
variable.tooltip:
Use to set a custom user ID or number. Note: when
the decoder is reset to default values, this CV is
preset to the softwares default CV value configuration.

variable.label: Air Pump 2 Enable
variable.tooltip: Choose whether the locomotive has one or two air pumps

variable.label: Slip Rate Control
variable.tooltip:
Control the variation or timing syncopation when articulated exhaust
is enabled to simulate slipping drive wheels or a double-header.

variable.label: Articulated Exhaust Control
variable.tooltip: Alters the exhaust timing to sound like a simple articulated engine when Auto Exhaust is activated.

variable.label: Cam Enable
variable.tooltip: When used in DCC mode, exhaust chuffs can be controlled automatically, or synced to a cam.

variable.label: Quiet Mode Timeout Period
variable.tooltip:
When loco has stopped and all functions are turned off, sound effects will turn
off automatically after timeout period has elapsed. Set to zero to disable.

variable.label: Bell Ring Rate
variable.tooltip: Controls the speed at which the bell rings (higher no. = slower rate

variable.label: Whistle Select
variable.comment: (Light Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select the primary whistle to use

variable.label: Alternate Whistle Select
variable.comment: (Light Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select an alternate whistle to use

variable.label: Whistle Select
variable.comment: (Medium Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select the primary whistle to use

variable.label: Alternate Whistle Select
variable.comment: (Medium Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select an alternate whistle to use

variable.label: Whistle Select
variable.comment: (Heavy Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select the primary whistle to use

variable.label: Alternate Whistle Select
variable.comment: (Heavy Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select an alternate whistle to use

variable.label: Whistle Select
variable.comment: (Lt Logging Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select the primary whistle to use

variable.label: Alternate Whistle Select
variable.comment: (Lt Logging Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select an alternate whistle to use

variable.label: Whistle Select
variable.comment: (DRGW C-Class Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select the primary whistle to use

variable.label: Alternate Whistle Select
variable.comment: (DRGW C-Class Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select an alternate whistle to use

variable.label: Whistle Select
variable.comment: (DRGW K-Class Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select the primary whistle to use

variable.label: Alternate Whistle Select
variable.comment: (DRGW K-Class Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select an alternate whistle to use

variable.label: Whistle Select
variable.comment: (SP Cab Forward Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select the primary whistle to use

variable.label: Alternate Whistle Select
variable.comment: (SP Cab Forward Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select an alternate whistle to use

variable.label: Whistle Select
variable.comment: (Southern Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select the primary whistle to use

variable.label: Alternate Whistle Select
variable.comment: (Southern Steam) Show these whistles for the models (productID) listed below
variable.tooltip: Select an alternate whistle to use

variable.label: Alternate Whistle Enable
variable.tooltip: Choose whether to use the alternate whistle or a short toot of the primary whistle

variable.label: Engine Exhaust Control
variable.tooltip:
For Auto-Exhaust synchronization, the chuff rate will be generated in proportion to the
throttle setting. Higher values = higher chuff rates; use zero to disable exhaust sound.

variable.label: Master Volume Control
variable.tooltip: Sets the overall volume of all sound channels

variable.label: Whistle Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the whistle

variable.label: Bell Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the bell

variable.label: Exhaust Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the engine exhaust

variable.label: Air Pump Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the air pump

variable.label: Dynamo Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the dynamo (electric power generator)

variable.label: Blower Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the blower

variable.label: Rod Clank Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the rods clanking

variable.label: Steam Release Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the steam release

variable.label: Coupler Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the couplers coupling

variable.label: Glad Hand Release Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the air hose glad hands separating

variable.label: Brake Squeal Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the brakes squealing

variable.label: Brake Release Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the brakes releasing

variable.label: Snifter Valve Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the snifter valve

variable.label: Power Reverse Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the power reverse operating

variable.label: Pop Valve Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the pop valve releasing

variable.label: Blower Draft Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the blower draft

variable.label: Water Stop Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the water stop activity

variable.label: Injector Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the injector operating

variable.label: Fireman Shovel Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the fireman shoveling

variable.label: Fireman Wrench Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the fireman using his wrench

variable.label: Fireman Oil Can Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the fireman using his oil can

variable.label: Fireman Grease Gun Volume
variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the fireman using his grease gun

variable.label: Equalizer Control
variable.tooltip: Selects one of six equalizer presets or selects a user adjustable profile

variable.label: 62 Hz Cut/Boost
variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 127 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)

variable.label: 125 Hz Cut/Boost
variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 127 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)

variable.label: 250 Hz Cut/Boost
variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 127 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)

variable.label: 500 Hz Cut/Boost
variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 127 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)

variable.label: 1K Hz Cut/Boost
variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 127 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)

variable.label: 2K Hz Cut/Boost
variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 127 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)

variable.label: 4K Hz Cut/Boost
variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 127 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)

variable.label: Reverb Control
variable.tooltip: Selects one of four reverb presets or selects a user adjustable profile

variable.label: Reverb Output Level
variable.tooltip: Specifies a percentage of the reverb output that is mixed back into the original audio signal

variable.label: Reverb Delay
variable.tooltip: Specifies the total reverb delay time from 0 to 64mS

variable.label: Reverb Gain
variable.tooltip: Specifies a percentage of the reverb output that is mixed back into the delay line

variable.label: Whistle Reverb Level
variable.tooltip: Sets the percentage of the whistle signal level to mix into the reverb input

variable.label: Bell Reverb Level
variable.tooltip: Sets the percentage of the bell signal level to mix into the reverb input

variable.label: Exhaust Reverb Level
variable.tooltip: Sets the percentage of the locomotive exhaust signal level to mix into the reverb input

variable.label: Air Pump Reverb Level
variable.tooltip: Sets the percentage of the air pump signal level to mix into the reverb input

variable.label: Throttle Gain
variable.tooltip:
Specifies the DDE sensitivity to the difference between the throttle
setting and the actual locomotive speed. Set to zero to disable.

variable.label: Motor Load Gain
variable.tooltip: Specifies the DDE sensitivity to changes in the motor load. Set to zero to disable.

variable.label: Attack Time Constant
variable.tooltip:
Determines the amount of time needed before the DDE processor will begin reshaping
the audio signal once the motor or throttle input signal has begun to change.

variable.label: Release Time Constant
variable.tooltip:
Determines the amount of time needed before the DDE processor will stop reshaping
the audio signal after the motor or throttle input signal has returned to normal.

variable.label: Exhaust Low Volume Limit
variable.tooltip:
Sets the maximum attenuation level of the exhaust sound when the
locomotive is under light load. (higher no. = greater attenuation)

variable.label: Exhaust High Volume Limit
variable.tooltip:
Sets the maximum volume level of the exhaust sound when the
locomotive is under heavy load. (higher no. = greater volume)

variable.label: Side Rod Clank Low Volume Limit
variable.tooltip:
Sets the maximum attenuation level of the side rod clanking sound when
the locomotive is under heavy load. (higher no. = greater attenuation)

variable.label: Side Rod Clank High Volume Limit
variable.tooltip:
Sets the maximum volume level of the side rod clanking sound when
the locomotive is under light load. (higher no. = greater volume)

variable.label: DDE Filter Initial Frequency
variable.tooltip: Specifies the initial frequency of the DDE filter bank. (higher no. = higher frequency)

variable.label: DDE Filter Control Gain
variable.tooltip:
Determines the sensitivity of the DDE filter bank to changes
in load and speed. (higher no. = greater sensitivity)

variable.label: DDE Filter Damping
variable.tooltip: Sets the overall damping ratio of the DDE Filter Bank.

variable.label: DDE Tracking Coefficient
variable.tooltip:
Sets the no load sense level for the DDE controller when
back-EMF is disabled, as a percentage of the track voltage.

variable.label: Bell-On Set Point
variable.tooltip: Specifies the throttle speed step where the automatic bell will first turn on

variable.label: Bell-Off Set Point
variable.tooltip: Specifies the throttle speed step where the automatic bell will turn off

variable.label: Grade Crossing Whistle Sensitivity
variable.tooltip: Specifies the positive rate of throttle change needed to activate the automatic grade crossing whistle

variable.label: Brake Squeal Sensitivity
variable.tooltip: Specifies the negative rate of throttle change needed to activate the automatic brake squeal

variable.label: Automatic Grade Crossing Whistle Enable (Analog Mode)
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Grade Crossing Whistle in Analog Mode

variable.label: Automatic Whistle Signal Enable (Analog Mode)
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Whistle Signal in Analog Mode

variable.label: Automatic Bell Enable (Analog Mode)
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Bell in Analog Mode

variable.label: Automatic Brake Squeal Enable (Analog Mode)
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Brake Squeal in Analog Mode

variable.label: Automatic Steam Blow Down Enable (Analog Mode)
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Steam Blow Down in Analog Mode

variable.label: Automatic Grade Crossing Whistle Enable
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Grade Crossing Whistle in Digital Mode

variable.label: Automatic Whistle Signal Enable
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Whistle Signal in Digital Mode

variable.label: Automatic Bell Enable
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Bell in Digital Mode

variable.label: Automatic Brake Squeal Enable
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Brake Squeal in Digital Mode

variable.label: Automatic Steam Blow Down Enable
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Steam Blow Down in Digital Mode

variable.label: Probability Fireman Shovels Coal
variable.tooltip: Sets the probability that the fireman will shovel some coal.

variable.label: Probability Fireman Fills the Tender
variable.tooltip: Sets the probability that the fireman will fill the tender with water.

variable.label: Probability Fireman Turns His Wrench
variable.tooltip: Sets the probability that the fireman will use his wrench.

variable.label: Probability Fireman Uses His Grease Gun
variable.tooltip: Sets the probability that the fireman will use the grease gun.

variable.label: Probability Fireman Uses His Oil Can
variable.tooltip: Sets the probability that the fireman will use the oil can.

variable.label: Probability Fireman Uses the Injector
variable.tooltip: Sets the probability that the fireman will use the water injector.

variable.label: Probability Fireman Uses the Blower
variable.tooltip: Sets the probability that the fireman will use the firebox blower.

variable.label: Probability Pop Valve Blows Off
variable.tooltip: Sets the probability that the safety valve will relieve.

variable.label: Motor Kp Coefficient (0-255)
variable.tooltip: Specifies a gain factor for the proportional part of the PID motor control equation

variable.label: Motor Ki Coefficient (0-255)
variable.tooltip: Specifies a gain factor for the integral part of the PID motor control equation

variable.label: Motor Control Intensity (0-255)
variable.tooltip: The CV value is interpreted as n/32 that is fed back from the control loop

variable.label: Motor Control Sample Period (0-31)
variable.tooltip: Specifies the time period in mS (milliseconds) between measurements

variable.label: Motor Control Sample Aperture Time (0-255)
variable.tooltip: Specifies a gain factor for the derivative part of the PID motor control equation

factReset.label: Reset all CVs to factory defaults

display.item: Side Rod Clank Low Volume Limit
Side Rod Clank Low Volume Limit
Side Rod Clank High Volume Limit
Side Rod Clank High Volume Limit
Automatic Grade Crossing Whistle Enable (Analog Mode)
Automatic Steam Blow Down Enable (Analog Mode)

label.label: These CVs allow the user to set the parameters
for the Automatic Sound Control features.
Set the probability that the various sound effects will occur the next time the locomotive is stopped.
A setting of zero effectively turns off an effect. A setting of 255 enables the effect at every stop.

display.item: Probability Fireman Uses His Grease Gun
Probability Fireman Uses His Grease Gun
Probability Fireman Uses His Oil Can
Probability Fireman Uses His Oil Can
